name: It Rains Feathers
description:
For years we have been hunting them. Now, it's our turn to be hunted.
It Rains Feathers is a survival game with tower defence elements. Defend against waves of man-eating ducks, build your base and see how long you can survive.
Originally a Duck Hunt parody it became a little buggy beast on it's own. Made with sticks and stones with low effort it's still a dear child of mind, so please, don't judge it too harshly.

HOW-TO:

WASD for movement.

Hold RMB to aim and press LMP to shoot.

Press ESCAPE to open upgrade menu.

Collect DUCK corpses to build upgrades. Try to hold as long as you can against the duck menace. Make it rain feathers.

                                                                                                                                     

No sounds because of time constains.

Made in Unity3D 2019. Sprites are created using Aseprite.
Made for Untitled Game Jam.
